title: Sustainability Requires Collaboration: Akamai's Growing Community and Supply Chain Initiatives
description: Akamai is committed to collaboration that inspires worldwide change. We know it's not enough to be environmentally conscious solely in our own business. To make a true impact on climate change, we need to use our unique position as a global corporation to encourage our partners to join us in taking sustainable action, participating in community improvement projects, and engaging in climate education. We need to consider the question:
author: Courtney Hadden
